Title: Seven Minutes in Heaven
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Marco Ramirez, Lauren Schmidt, Whit Anderson (executive story editor), Luke Kalteux (executive story editor), Sneha Koorse (executive story editor)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Jon Bernthal
Plot: Castle gets an offer he can't refuse. Foggy and Murdock question the future of their firm, but Karen won't give up so easily.
